question: This country will hosts the World's Largest Conference on Cyber Space at the end of this year.
explanation: India will host World's Largest Conference on Cyber Space at the end of this year with the theme "An Inclusive, Sustainable, Developmental, Safe and Secure Cyberspace, the GCCS 2017". It will take place on the 23rd and 24th of November, 2017 in Aero City, New Delhi. The Global Conference on Cyberspace (GCCS) aims to deliberate on the issues related to promotion of cooperation in cyberspace, norms for responsible behaviors in cyberspace and to enhance cyber capacity building.
